OpenAlea released packages

Core
core of openalea (e.g., package management)

target: developers

Deploy
installation, package deployment, ...

target: developers

DeployGui
GUI to install/uninstall packages

target: users, developers

Misc
miscellaneous tools (e.g, sphinx, developers tools)

target: developers, administrators

Stdlib
standard tools (stats, image, data, files

target: users, developers

Sconsx
scons extension

target: developers, administrators

Visualea
Graphical application (visual programming)

target: users, developers

Openalea_meta
target: developers, administrators

Scheduler
target: users, developers
